version_description:
Bug Fixes
Moneytree PRO: first-to-market mobile support for Japanese Corporate accounts
“Vault” improvements make registering and managing accounts easier
— In addition to regular updates “Update Now” available 3x per day 
— Accounts can be paused, unpaused, and archived

— Support for puzzle-type sign-in verification 
— An even better way to edit your transaction details
— Big fixes

The core features of Moneytree are provided free of charge, to all, forever. 
No banner ads in the app
No 3rd party emails
No personal data crawling
No giving user data to third parties
No requests for demographic or other unnecessary data
No hidden charges or fees
Even still, Moneytree’s free PFM is better than most paid options.

— Big fixes

The core features of Moneytree are provided free of charge, to all, forever. 
No banner ads in the app
No 3rd party emails
No personal data crawling
No giving user data to third parties
No requests for demographic or other unnecessary data
No hidden charges or fees
Even still, Moneytree’s free PFM is better than most paid options.

Optimisation
Bug fixes

What’s new:
— Support for Japanese securities accounts
— See your monthly cash flow by account
— Export all your transactions, by account or in total (Paid)
— Bug fixes and optimization

Bug Fixes
Optimization

- Access history shown in Vault settings
- Native support for iPad Pro
- Bug Fixes and Optimzation

- Access history shown in Vault settings
- Native support for iPad Pro
- Bug Fixes and Optimization

Optimisation
Bug Fixes

- Now optimised for iOS 10
- Awesome new bill-splitting app for iMessage
- Fun iMessage stickers
- Support for 1Password
- Bug fixes

- Now optimised for iOS 10
- Awesome new bill-splitting app for iMessage
- Fun iMessage stickers
- Support for 1Password
- Bug fixes

- Apple Pay Suica Support: ride and fare information imported directly into your transaction list (All Users)
- Automated, AI-Powered Receipt Matching (Paid Service)
1. Photoscan: Use your iPhone's camera as a scanner! Moneytree will automatically shoot, crop, and clean up the image.
2. The latest OCR engine accurately reads and interprets your receipt data. 
3. Your receipt data is automatically matched with any past or future transaction stored in Moneytree.

- Other Improvements (All Users)
Support for SMBC Debit Cards

Try Moneytree Work Expenses and Corporate free for a month!
Optimization & Bug fixes

Try Moneytree Work Expenses and Corporate free for a month!
Optimization & Bug fixes

We’ve been hard at work bringing the latest iOS 11 features to Moneytree.

••  For All iOS 11 Devices ••  
• Welcome support for Siri: simply ask, and instantly see your balances without needing to open the app
• Safari Keychain: Tap the key icon, verify with Touch ID, and select your login credential from the list. No more forgotten passwords, no more fumbling with your keyboard
• A massively improved custom category menu that now includes a frequently-used category screen, and a buttery smooth drag-and-drop for favourited categories

••  For Expenses on iOS 11 ••
• Drag and Drop images straight from your Photo Library to Cloud Safe on iPad.

We’ve been hard at work bringing the latest iOS 11 features to Moneytree.

••  For All iOS 11 Devices ••  
• Welcome support for Siri: simply ask, and instantly see your balances without needing to open the app
• Safari Keychain: Tap the key icon, verify with Touch ID, and select your login credential from the list. No more forgotten passwords, no more fumbling with your keyboard
• A massively improved custom category menu that now includes a frequently-used category screen, and a buttery smooth drag-and-drop for favourited categories

••  For Expenses on iOS 11 ••
• Drag and Drop images straight from your Photo Library to Cloud Safe on iPad.

We’ve been hard at work bringing the latest iOS 11 features to Moneytree.

••  For All iOS 11 Devices ••  
• Welcome support for Siri: simply ask, and instantly see your balances without needing to open the app
• Safari Keychain: Tap the key icon, verify with Touch ID, and select your login credential from the list. No more forgotten passwords, no more fumbling with your keyboard
• A massively improved custom category menu that now includes a frequently-used category screen, and a buttery smooth drag-and-drop for favourited categories

••  For Expenses on iOS 11 ••
• Drag and Drop images straight from your Photo Library to Cloud Safe on iPad.

**Face ID for iPhone X**
Unlocking Moneytree is easier than ever with native support for Face ID on iPhone X. 

And, we are continuing to bring the latest iOS 11 features to Moneytree.

**For All iOS 11 Devices**  
*Support for Siri: simply ask, and instantly see your balances without needing to open the app
*Safari Keychain: Tap the key icon, verify with Touch ID, and select your login credential from the list. No more forgotten passwords, no more fumbling with your keyboard
*A massively improved custom category menu that now includes a frequently-used category screen, and a buttery smooth drag-and-drop for favourited categories

**For Expenses on iOS 11**
*Drag and Drop images straight from your Photo Library to Cloud Safe on iPad.
*Moneytree Work Expenses is a paid feature. For a limited time, you can try Moneytree free for a month.  See the description for details about work expenses.

**Face ID for iPhone X**
Unlocking Moneytree is easier than ever with native support for Face ID on iPhone X. 

And, we are continuing to bring the latest iOS 11 features to Moneytree.

**For All iOS 11 Devices**  
*Support for Siri: simply ask, and instantly see your balances without needing to open the app
*Safari Keychain: Tap the key icon, verify with Touch ID, and select your login credential from the list. No more forgotten passwords, no more fumbling with your keyboard
*A massively improved custom category menu that now includes a frequently-used category screen, and a buttery smooth drag-and-drop for favourited categories

**For Expenses on iOS 11**
*Drag and Drop images straight from your Photo Library to Cloud Safe on iPad.
*Moneytree Work Expenses is a paid feature. For a limited time, you can try Moneytree free for a month.  See the description for details about work expenses.

**New year, new you campaign pricing: ¥500/mo; ¥5,400/year. Campaign ends March 31st. 
**And to keep things sharp and speedy, we've smushed few bug fixes and done a bit of optimisation
Switch easily between personal and work transactions with our awesome new tab bar. Now it takes even fewer taps to get the data you need!

***Make managing work expenses a breeze. Mark transactions as business, add descriptions, even attach receipts and store them in the cloud. From there, create editable, exportable expense claims on the fly. Expenses not your cup of ocha? Try data export for all transactions, including loyalty and credit card history. All in one place, now at a special price. 
**Please see paid subscription in app details**

From there, create editable, exportable expense claims on the fly. Expenses not your cup of ocha? Try data export for all transactions, including loyalty and credit card history. All in one place, now for a special price:  ¥500/mo; ¥5,400/year. Campaign ends March 31st.
**Please see paid subscription in app details**

***Brand new and optimised for iOS 12!

***Siri Shortcuts automate your daily routine. 
Check Moneytree on your commute? Siri will provide you with a shortcut to tap right through to your usual screen. That coffee you buy with cash every morning? Shortcuts will save you time by asking if you want to log that cash transaction with one tap. Shortcuts will also offer a list of other common in-app actions. Download the latest version and start exploring today. 

***Password Manager Integration
Keeping track of your passwords is hard. iPhone makes it easier with iCloud Keychain, but if you used 1Password, LastPass or Dashlane, you might have felt left out. iOS 12 integrates the world’s most popular password managers, meaning you can now connect your netbank accounts to Moneytree with the usernames and passwords already securely stored in other services. Now it’s super easy to add your second credit card or miles program to Moneytree. Get more out of Moneytree today.

Brand new and optimised for iOS 12!

Download the latest version and start exploring today. 

***Password Manager Integration
Keeping track of your passwords is hard. iPhone makes it easier with iCloud Keychain, but if you used 1Password, LastPass or Dashlane, you might have felt left out. iOS 12 integrates the world’s most popular password managers, meaning you can now connect your netbank accounts to Moneytree with the usernames and passwords already securely stored in other services. Now it’s super easy to add your second credit card or miles program to Moneytree. Get more out of Moneytree today.

Moneytree Work Expenses (Paid Service)
***Introducing Automated Expense Detection
Moneytree’s new AI automatically identifies any transactions that could be potentially categorised as work-related expenses. Subscribe now to Moneytree Work and automate your expense management! Save hours per month sorting and separating the money you spent on yourself versus the money you spent on behalf of your job.

Brand new and optimised for iOS 12!
***Batched Transaction Categorisation Notification
Moneytree will help you improve your spending summary by notifying you about uncategorised transactions. The new feature will allow you to easily select the appropriate category for multiple transactions in one go. Turn it on from the notifications setting and save time from tapping through individual transactions for a better understanding of your expenses.

**Discontinuation of iMessage “Share Expense” Feature**
The iMessage Moneytree “Share Expense” feature has been discontinued as of June 2019. The stickers are still available in iMessage.

**Custom Spending Cycle**
Having a hard time tracking your spending? This new feature will allow you to customise weekly and monthly periods according to your spending cycle! 
1. Start day of the week
Easily track your weekly spending with a personalised view and save yourself from going over-budget.
2. End date of the month
Customise your monthly view based on payment due dates or to sync with your payday to understand your spending patterns and better manage your money. 

Moneytree Work Expenses (Paid Service)
**Custom Period Data Export**
The Data Export feature just got even better. This update allows you to specify the date range for any transaction data you would like to export and download as Excel or CSV. Save those hours sorting and separating the money you spent on yourself versus the money you spent on behalf of your job.

**Custom Spending Cycle**
Having a hard time tracking your spending? This new feature will allow you to customise weekly and monthly periods according to your spending cycle! 
1. Start day of the week
Easily track your weekly spending with a personalised view and save yourself from going over-budget.
2. End date of the month
Customise your monthly view based on payment due dates or to sync with your payday to understand your spending patterns and better manage your money.
Moneytree Work Expenses (Paid Service)
**Custom Period Data Export**
The Data Export feature just got even better. This update allows you to specify the date range for any transaction data you would like to export and download as Excel or CSV. Save those hours sorting and separating the money you spent on yourself versus the money you spent on behalf of your job.

◆ New Subscription Service “Moneytree Grow” is Available!
Budgeting and reporting features will help you gain deeper insights to develop good financial habits and better plan for your future.

Take control of your spending with our new “Budget by Category” feature by setting a monthly budget for each category and receive notifications.

We’ve also included “Daily Background Updates” and “Data Export” features that update your information in the background on a daily basis and allows you to download your transactions from the previous year to an Excel or CSV file.

We have annual and monthly subscriptions available for you to choose from and offer a 1-month free trial for anyone who is trying it for the first time.
• Yearly Plan ¥3,600 (2-months free compared to monthly plan)
• Monthly Plan ¥360

◆ Cash Tracking is easier than ever with Siri Conversational Shortcuts! 
Shortcuts are a natural fit for a personal finance app like Moneytree. With iOS 13.1 Siri Conversational Shortcuts, you will be able to use the voice command with more flexibility and add cash spendings without opening the app. 
All that cash spending you were recording manually can now be done by simply asking Siri. Download the latest version and start exploring today.
